Authentication and Security • User Login & Password: • Secure user registration and login system. • Include “Forgot Password” and session management (logout, change password). • Data Encryption: • All patient and clinician data must be encrypted at rest and in transit. • Use HTTPS and localStorage/sessionStorage with secure flags. • Compliance: • Align with GDPR, HIPAA (if applicable), and ensure consent-based audio capture. 7. Stripe Integration • Subscription Billing: • Integrate Stripe for user subscription plans (monthly/yearly). • Free trial option with restricted features. • Handle billing updates, cancellations, invoices, and failed payments. • Display billing section in user dashboard. 8. Integration and Navigation • Link to Clinical Tools: • Include direct access to tools like the NEWS2 Calculator. • Optional: Pass structured inputs from transcripts to pre-fill calculator fields in the future. ⸻ Development Stack & Tools Frontend (Chrome Extension) • React + TypeScript • TailwindCSS for UI styling • Chrome Extension APIs (manifest v3) • LocalStorage/IndexedDB for offline storage • Toast notifications for feedback (e.g., “Recording started”, “Transcript saved”) Backend / Services • Node.js + Express or Firebase for auth and database • MongoDB / Firestore for user and session data • AssemblyAI API for transcription • Cheapest LLM API (OpenRouter/Together.ai) for summarisation • Stripe API for payments ⸻ Security & Privacy • End-to-end encryption: All sensitive data including audio, transcripts, and notes must be encrypted. • Role-based Access: Only authorized users can access their session data. • Data Retention: Configurable settings for how long transcripts are stored. • Consent Warning: Clear notification before starting a recording (checkbox or popup disclaimer). ⸻ Why SOAP Notes?
